snippet: Stanley Marsh 3, an eccentric millionaire known for his Cadillac Ranch art display, has settled lawsuits from 10 teenagers who said he paid them for sex acts, lawyers announced Saturday.
abstract: Stanley Marsh 3, eccentric millionaire known for his Cadillac Ranch art display in Amarillo, Tex, settles lawsuits from 10 teenagers who said he paid them for sex acts.
lead_paragraph: Stanley Marsh 3, an eccentric millionaire known for his Cadillac Ranch art display, has settled lawsuits from 10 teenagers who said he paid them for sex acts, lawyers announced Saturday.

headline.seo: Millionaire Stanley Marsh 3 Settles Abuse Lawsuit
headline.main: Cadillac Ranch Millionaire Settles Sexual Abuse Suits
headline.print_headline: Cadillac Ranch Millionaire Settles Sexual Abuse Suits
